text: David Hardy may refer to: * David T. Hardy (born 1951), American author and attorney * David A. Hardy (born 1936), British artist and illustrator * David Hardy (cricketer) (1877–1951), English cricketer ==See also== *David Hardie (1856–1945), doctor *David Hardie (politician) (1860s–1939), British politician *[David P Hardy] (CEO), Boys’ Latin of Philadelphia
title: David Hardy
